Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam will be leading Pakistan.
Jos Buttler will continue to lead the English side.
The key point is the return of Jofra Archer after a long layoff due to an injury.
Most of the players in the squad are returning from IPL 2024 and will be looking to carry forward their form.
Pakistan faced Ireland in a three-match T20I series before heading to England. After losing the first game, they bounced back and won the next two to clinch the series.
England’s last assignment in the shortest format was way back in December 2023 when they toured the West Indies. They lost the series by a 3-2 margin.
England are all set to host Pakistan for a four-match T20I series as a preparation for the T20 World Cup 2024.
As the hosts and the defending T20 World Cup champions, England have the edge in this series.
Prediction: England to win this contest.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Headingley offers a good amount of assistance to the pacers.
There is a high chance of rain predicted on Wednesday, with the temperature expected to be under 15 degrees Celsius.
There have been 29 meetings between England and Pakistan in the shortest format. England have won 19 of those whereas Pakistan have won nine, with one ending in no-result.
